content.raw:
I've observed intermittent seg-faults in the heightmap regression test HeightmapTest.Heights. I'm not sure if this is the same seg-fault, but I'm putting the backtraces here.

To reproduce:
~~~
while test/regression/heightmap ; do date; done
~~~

It reaches the second test (Heights)
~~~
[ RUN      ] HeightmapTest.Heights
Msg Waiting for master
Msg Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
Msg Publicized address: 192.168.1.67
Dbg ServerFixture load in 0.11 seconds, timeout after 60 seconds
Segmentation fault (core dumped)
~~~

Here's a backtrace:
~~~
Program terminated with signal 11, Segmentation fault.
#0  0x00007faa308c0447 in std::__detail::_List_node_base::_M_unhook() () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6
(gdb) bt
#0  0x00007faa308c0447 in std::__detail::_List_node_base::_M_unhook() () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6
#1  0x00007faa32468edb in gazebo::rendering::Scene::PreRender() ()
   from /home/scpeters/osrf/gazebo2/build/gazebo/rendering/libgazebo_rendering.so.1
#2  0x00007faa3272725e in gazebo::sensors::SensorManager::ImageSensorContainer::Update(bool) ()
   from /home/scpeters/osrf/gazebo2/build/gazebo/sensors/libgazebo_sensors.so.1
#3  0x00007faa3272961d in gazebo::sensors::SensorManager::Update(bool) ()
   from /home/scpeters/osrf/gazebo2/build/gazebo/sensors/libgazebo_sensors.so.1
#4  0x0000000000459fb8 in gazebo::Server::Run() ()
#5  0x000000000044bd7f in ServerFixture::RunServer(std::string const&, bool, std::string const&) ()
#6  0x00007faa311fece9 in thread_proxy () from /usr/lib/libboost_thread.so.1.46.1
#7  0x00007faa31b7ae9a in start_thread (arg=0x7faa1d505700) at pthread_create.c:308
#8  0x00007faa3007ecbd in clone () at ../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/x86_64/clone.S:112
#9  0x0000000000000000 in ?? ()
(gdb)
~~~
content.html:
I've observed intermittent seg-faults in the heightmap regression test HeightmapTest.Heights. I'm not sure if this is the same seg-fault, but I'm putting the backtraces here.

To reproduce:

while test/regression/heightmap ; do date; done

It reaches the second test (Heights)

[ RUN      ] HeightmapTest.Heights
Msg Waiting for master
Msg Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
Msg Publicized address: 192.168.1.67
Dbg ServerFixture load in 0.11 seconds, timeout after 60 seconds
Segmentation fault (core dumped)

Here's a backtrace:

Program terminated with signal 11, Segmentation fault.
#0  0x00007faa308c0447 in std::__detail::_List_node_base::_M_unhook() () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6
(gdb) bt
#0  0x00007faa308c0447 in std::__detail::_List_node_base::_M_unhook() () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6
#1  0x00007faa32468edb in gazebo::rendering::Scene::PreRender() ()
   from /home/scpeters/osrf/gazebo2/build/gazebo/rendering/libgazebo_rendering.so.1
#2  0x00007faa3272725e in gazebo::sensors::SensorManager::ImageSensorContainer::Update(bool) ()
   from /home/scpeters/osrf/gazebo2/build/gazebo/sensors/libgazebo_sensors.so.1
#3  0x00007faa3272961d in gazebo::sensors::SensorManager::Update(bool) ()
   from /home/scpeters/osrf/gazebo2/build/gazebo/sensors/libgazebo_sensors.so.1
#4  0x0000000000459fb8 in gazebo::Server::Run() ()
#5  0x000000000044bd7f in ServerFixture::RunServer(std::string const&, bool, std::string const&) ()
#6  0x00007faa311fece9 in thread_proxy () from /usr/lib/libboost_thread.so.1.46.1
#7  0x00007faa31b7ae9a in start_thread (arg=0x7faa1d505700) at pthread_create.c:308
#8  0x00007faa3007ecbd in clone () at ../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/x86_64/clone.S:112
#9  0x0000000000000000 in ?? ()
(gdb)
